ComicInfo.Title: Sticks and Stitches; Modern Mother Goose; Great Scenes from Horror Movies; Music Hath Charm; Written Forms for All Occasio [sic]; Gamble Gambol; Farmer's Old Almanac; Dial 'A' for Africa; Animals in Advertising; A Cracked Guide to Footwear; Beatlezania
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Ygor obtained the monster's brain from a pinball machine.
A violinist carries his instrument in a machine gun case.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:45:52. [Issue ID 250403]
ComicInfo.Penciller: John Severin, Charlie Rodrigues, Bill Ward
ComicInfo.Inker: John Severin, Charlie Rodrigues, Bill Ward
